mobs.LongDesc: A Wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
wizard. He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
rings and bracelets.

mobs.LongDesc: The Baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A fat, nice looking baker. But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.

mobs.LongDesc: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.

mobs.LongDesc:
A weaponsmith is standing here, eager to sell you his latest implements of
carnage and destruction.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He's a young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn.

mobs.LongDesc: An Armorer stands here displaying his shiny new (and previously owned) armors.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An old but very strong armorer.  He has made more armors in his life than you
have ever seen.

mobs.LongDesc: A receptionist sits behind the desk, smiling at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

mobs.LongDesc: A retired Captain stands here, selling boats.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This Captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.

mobs.LongDesc: A Sailor stands here, waiting to help you.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

mobs.LongDesc: Uncle Juan is here ready to take your order.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks like he may or may not have a green card.

mobs.LongDesc:
Wally the Watermaster is standing behind the counter, proudly displaying his
fine collection of contemporary waters.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Wally is a bit pudgy but looks very strong.  He has a glass of Midgaard
Natural Spring Water in his hand.

mobs.LongDesc: The head Postmaster is standing here, waiting to help you with your mail.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Postmaster seems like a happy old man, though a bit sluggish.  He worries
about the reputation of the MMS (Midgaard Mail Service), as many people seem to
think that it's slow.  Perhaps if he were to brush the cobwebs from his uniform
it'd help to make a better impression.

mobs.LongDesc: The Prototype for solo quests. these stats are a guide. edit mob 3012
The pintacle of ultimate evil is here, smirking in disgust.
You see the man, the myth, the legend, the quest postmaster.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He is a tall boy about 7 feet tall, and he is ready to kick yer ass.

mobs.LongDesc: A minion of the great Demon Lord is here protecting his master.
The Guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses.  She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your god; he has
a peaceful, loving look.  You notice that he is surrounded by a white aura.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it -
the way of the true thief.  She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars
across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He
has a calm look on his face.

mobs.LongDesc: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive as
well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: A Knight Templar is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith.
His duty is to protect the faithful fom persecution and infidel attacks and
his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly
opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as possible,
using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how and where to use
them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes him a deadly opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: A knight is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: You see the man, the myth, the legend, the quest postmaster.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He is a tall boy about 7 feet tall, and he is ready to kick yer ass.

mobs.LongDesc: The statue of Brian 'Wes' Wesley, former IMP, stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see before you the statue of Wesley.  He was known in real life
as Brian...and you know he helped rebuild and repair a failed
mud known as RealityBites....

mobs.LongDesc: The Protector is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Years of training show as you look at this strong-looking man.  His holy
shield strapped to his left arm glows as he watches you approach.  The 
point of his broadsword is in the ground as he holds onto the pommel,
ready to use it if the need calls.  You notice that he is without a
helm as his hair blows in the breeze created by your enterance into
this room.

mobs.LongDesc: A Desecrator is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The man blocks the doorway as you enter.  His black, full plate armor
shows some dents from a recent battle.  This man looks like he knows how
to handle the sword that hangs in his scabbard.  His black helm with
a red plume is held under his right arm while his shield gives off
an evil red glow.  You know it will take him mere seconds to wear the
helm and grab the sword.  Not enough time for you to damage him too
much.  His eyes glow a bloody red as you stand there staring at him.

mobs.LongDesc: The Guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses.  She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A tired looking waiter.

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A tired looking waiter.

mobs.LongDesc: A Bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A tired looking waiter.

mobs.LongDesc:
A man who in his young days was a famous sorcerer but now leads a quiet,
peaceful life as a waiter.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A serene waiter stands here, meditating upon his faith.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter who knows where all his costumers has their money.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc:
A waiter is here who looks like he could easily kill you while still carrying
quite a few firebreathers.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty.  He likes to keep his costumers happy,
but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

mobs.LongDesc: Bill Clinton, President of the United States, is here chuckling evilly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Doesn't look like much, does he? This is the man plotting to destroy this
MUD and every other MUD like it! Kill him now, before he succeeds!

mobs.LongDesc: The highest ranking monk is here to teach you the ancient ways.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Grandmaster of Flowers is the most honorable title among
monks. The thin, bald-headed man who regards you calmly hardly
seems the lethal type. But that is the mystique of monks...the
ability to accomplish amazing feats by means of training, not
raw phisical abilities.

mobs.LongDesc: The master sorcerer waits for apprentices.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You can see very little of this master of the arcane arts. He
sits behind a large desk, and is wearing a heavy black robe, with
the cowl pulled down. Noticing your attention, he becons with one
thin-fingered hand for you to approach, and greets you with a
whispered voice.

mobs.LongDesc: A heavily-muscled master warrior is willing to train you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He may rule a kingdom, but he is an adventurer at heart.
Standing head and shoulders taller than most men, he looks like
a body-builder. Shunning armor, he faces his foes with a combination
of strength and fury that few can match.

mobs.LongDesc: A high priest wishes to enlighten your soul.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dressed all in white, with gold trim, and wearing a mitre, the
high priest hardly looks like an impoverished humanitarian. In
fact, he has a certain assured authority about him. Maybe being
a cleric wouldn't be bad after all.

mobs.LongDesc: A true outdoorsman tips his hat to you and smiles.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He wears a hat with the brim bend upwards on one side, and a
vest made from some sort of leather. A necklace of sharp teeth
decorates his neck. Everything about this master ranger attests
to his competance.

mobs.LongDesc: A well-dressed man lifts a glass of champaign to you as you enter.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dressed in a well-tailored suit and looking like a movie star,
this man hardly seems the thieving type. That's the point. As a
master spy, he has stolen secrets and technologies from anyone
he was ordered to. A master of deception, he is a gentleman one
minute, and commando the next.

mobs.LongDesc: A great, holy knight bows to you, and asks to teach you virtue.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
His neaty-groomed hair and well-trimmed, greying beard give this
man an air of dignity and authority. Dressed in chain mail even
outside of battle, and wearing a tabard bearing a red lion crest,
he is every bit the dedicated warrior.

mobs.LongDesc: A black clad master of darkness waits silently for pupils.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dressed completely in black, this large man exudes evil. His face
is obscured by a mask, also of black, presumably covering some
disfigurement brought about by his dealing with dark powers.
When he adresses you, his voice is raspy, and his breathing labored,
suggesting that this man has paid the price for the vast powers
he now posesses.

mobs.LongDesc: A Gold StrikeForce peacekeeper is standing here, nervously ready to jump at any sign of trouble.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks real tuff and real smart.  He also looks like he is ready to rock!

mobs.LongDesc: A Red StrikeForce cityguard stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobs.LongDesc: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.
A beastly fido is mucking through the garbage here looking for food.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging
around his teeth.

mobs.LongDesc: A mercenary is waiting for a job here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks pretty mean, and you imagine he'd do anything for money.

mobs.LongDesc: A singing, happy Drunk.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

mobs.LongDesc: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

mobs.LongDesc: A yaj onivel is here, walking backwards.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The yaj is a small imp that has been reversed by some jay.

mobs.LongDesc: A Blue StrikeForce cityguard stands here, guarding the gate.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobs.LongDesc: An oozing green gelatinous blob is here, sucking in bits of debris.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A horrid looking thing; it's huge, greenish, and looks like the blob.

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with God.
A magnificent Paladin Knight is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith.
His duty is to protect the faithful fom persecution and infidel attacks and
his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly
opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge he possesses.  He is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that he is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

mobs.LongDesc: The statistician is here to help you with your numbers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man has the ability to increase or decrease your stats.  Don't
make him angry or you will regret it.

mobs.LongDesc: A powerful man is here working at the forge.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Samson is almost seven feet tall, and his arms are as wide around as your
waist.  He is wearing only pants and boots, and is covered in soot except
where trickles of sweat have washed it away.  His body is marked with
small scars from red hot shards of iron.  His long black hair is pulled
back loosely, framing a handsome face.  His hazel eyes meet your gaze with
such a look of pride and confidence that you find yourself thinking that
he may be the best smith you have ever met, even before you see his work.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An old man with grey hair, your guildmaster is truly ancient. His
knowledge of the traditional ways is vast, and he is a master of
every technique.

mobs.LongDesc: An ancient, shriveled woman watches you from beneath a large hooded robe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Her body is shriveled and looks about 300 years old, but she still moves
and talks with strength and confidence. This quality, along with her
robes, reveal her as a powerful mage.

mobs.LongDesc: A nine foot tall man sits in the middle of the room.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is huge, nine feet tall to be exact. He has rippling muscles and bronze
skin. His features are perfect. This is a messenger from the Gods. He was
sent to provide rewards for those who pass the tests the Gods set forth
for them.

mobs.LongDesc: Magica, the hotel manager smiles happily behind the front desk
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A smiling young looking woman stands here proud of having the best hotel in 
all Town.

mobs.LongDesc: The master psionicist probes your mind for psionic ability.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A tall, wirey man stares down at you, trying to assess your worthiness. You
feel a tingle in your mind and then a powerful presence as this master of all
psionicists probes you for the powers which would qualify you to become one
of the rarest of people on this world -- a psionicist.  He frowns and you can
tell he is almost ready to reject your untrained mind as not having the
prowess needed, but at the last minute something changes his mind and his
face returns to its normal, neutral mask.

mobs.LongDesc: A small loyal kitten is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A small loyal puppy is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A large, trained wolf is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

mobs.LongDesc:
The Cryogenicist is here, staring at you and playing with a canister of
liquid nitrogen.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

mobs.LongDesc: An Anti-Paladin is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the forces of evil.
His duty is to protect his brethen from persecution and his dedication
to the forces of evil combined with his superior skill makes him a
deadly opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A tired looking waiter.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Even though your guildmaster looks tired and battle scarred, you can
clearly see the vast amount of knowledge he possesses.  He is
wearing dark black armor, and you notice that he is surrounded by
a black aura.

mobs.LongDesc: An acolyte monk guards the monks' guild.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This acolyte is wearing a drab-colored tunic, leggings and
sandals, and has his head shaved bare. He is ordered to guard this
entrance against non-monks, even at the cost of his own life.
